```{r,include=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("Larsvanderlaan/RStatisticalSoftware/hal9001")

```

```{r}
library(hal9001)
n=300
X = matrix(cbind(runif(n,0,5),runif(n,-2,5)), nrow=n)

y = rowSums(X)^3 -5 

f=fit_hal(X,y,screen_basis_main_terms=T,family = "gaussian", cv_select = T,  smoothness_orders = 2, include_order_zero = F)

plot(predict(f, new_data = X),y)
#plot(X,predict(f, new_data = X))

```
